@Saberfang actually I do wanna see something like that sometime, these works from this group especially go to some serious extremes, I always wondered if they would ever touch on if the victim went suicidal or would cause some sort of emotional distress from the bullies, or would they just not care? The other works follow a common theme of extreme bullying and humiliation, but there is also small hints that they care/love the victim as well, but derive that love more from the act of humiliating them then the person themselves. Ah well, something I don't think will ever get touched upon in a doujin.
